import React from "react"; import "./About.css"; import heroImage from "./assets/hero-image.jpg"; // Update with your hero image path import profileImage from "./assets/deepa-profile.jpg"; // Update with your profile image path const About = () => { return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Deepa Devangmath

Architect | Urban Designer | Interior Specialist

{/* About Section */}

Hello! I'm Deepa Devangmath

I'm a recent architecture graduate with a deep passion for designing spaces that connect people and evoke emotion. To me, architecture is about more than just structures—it's about crafting environments that resonate with the way people live, feel, and interact. I believe in creating spaces that inspire and bring out the best in those who experience them. Eager to learn and adapt, I’ve always been quick to grasp new concepts and apply them effectively. I’m excited to explore new ideas, challenge conventions, and contribute to projects that make a meaningful impact on how we connect with the world around us.

); }; export default About;
